E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1975
Subject: Progress of Dan Spillner
Dear Sir,
Dan Spillner is doing pretty good at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an ERA of 3.77, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/9/1975
Subject: Progress of Eduardo Rodriguez
Dear Sir,
Eduardo Rodriguez has nothing more to prove at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an ERA of 2.81 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1975
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Johnny Callison
